pageSize.description: Size of the page to retrieve

specialty.description: Return only the companies that has manufactured in this specialty

CC.description: The CC license version number (if not CC public domain)

siteURL.description: Web site where the photo is. Not to be confused with the URL of the photo itself. In this, in addition to the photo, there is usually other information such as the author, date of capture...

site.description: Web site name of the URL provided.

embedId.description: ID of the image to embed via SmartFrame.io

PhotoSchema.description: A valid photo object, with license info.

Driver.description: Object that contains all the basic info about a driver

year.description: The year (or F1 session) of the event. Obtained from the ID in the constructor.

round.description: The round number of the event in its year. Obtained from the ID in the constructor.

circuit.description: The full circuit object. Got in the contructor

grandPrix.description: The full grand prix object. Got in the contructor

TimedSessionResult.description: Common interface for timed sessions, like free practices, warm ups...

driver.description: The full driver object. Got in the contructor

race.description: The full race event object. Got in the contructor

pageSize.description: Size of the page to retrieve

chassisManufacturerId.description: If specified, the call will return only the results where the company that has this ID appears as the chassis manufacturer

engineManufacturerId.description: If specified, the call will return only the results where the company that has this ID appears as the  engine manufacturer

eventId.description: If specified, it will return only results relative to the event that has this ID

year.description: If specified, it will return only results relative to this year's events

driverId.description: If specified, it will return only results relative to the pilot having this ID

race.description: The full race event object. Got in the contructor

pos.description: The position of the driver in the lap

time.description: Time of this lap in ms

pitStopLap.description: The lap of the race in which the pit stop happened

time.description: Time of this pit stops in ms. The time is counted from the moment the pilot crosses the line of the pits until he leaves them.

timeOfDay.description: The time of the day of the pit stop.

annotation.description: Some notes about the pit stop.

pageSize.description: Size of the page to retrieve

driver.description: The full driver object. Got in the contructor

race.description: The full race event object. Got in the contructor

position.description: Finishing position in the race, converted to number. Will be `nan` if the driver has not finished the race

positionText.description: Finishing position in the race. Could be `DNF`, `DNQ`... if the driver has not finished the race

positionsGained.description: The positions gained during the race

pageSize.description: Size of the page to retrieve

chassisManufacturerId.description: If specified, the call will return only the results where the company that has this ID appears as the chassis manufacturer

driverId.description: If specified, it will return only results relative to the pilot having this ID

positionText.description: Filter by a specific postion text, that can be `1`, `2`, `3`... or `DNF`, `DNS`...

minPos.description: Look for the results where the driver achieved a position worse than or equal to this number.

maxPos.description: Look for the results where the driver achieved a position better than or equal to this number.
